name: Captain Greenbeard
text: [Cooldown 2]: This turn, minions you summon in enemy territory have Haste.

name: Elber, Jungle Emissary
text: When you play a card that costs 8 or more, heal for 4.

name: Elyse of the Order
text: [Warmup 6]: Summon a Lucian Soldier. Warmup is reduced by 1 whenever you play a minion.

name: Executor Ginn
text: [2 Mana, Skip an Attack]: Destroy an ally minion and convert the tile it occupied to a village.

name: Fael Spiritwalker
text: [Warmup 13]: Summon a Daemon Familiar. Cooldown reduced by 1 when a minion dies.

name: It That Weaves
text: [Range 4, Cooldown 2]: Pull a minion in a straight line to It That Weaves. It has -1/-1/-1 until the end of its turn.

name: Kai, Longcount Shaman
text: [Warmup 25]: An enemy commander gains "At the start of turn, take 5 Damage". When you cast a Spell, reduce Warmup by 1.

name: Lazim, Thief of Gods
text: Your deck may contain cards from any god, but not neutral cards.

name: Lubela, Tender of the Wilds
text: When you play a minion in your territory, it gains +2 Health until the start of your next turn.

name: Macks Speed
text: Whenever you move, gain +1 Power this turn.

name: Newhaven Township
text: Realmbound. Your Village tiles produce an additional mana. You may claim uncontested tiles at a distance.

name: Soultaker Viessa
text: [Warmup 3, Range 2]: Deal 2 Damage to a Character and heal 2 Health to Soultaker Viessa.

name: Starwise Luna
text: [Cooldown 5]: Refresh all but one of your Mana.
